name: Tales from Ilmaril demo
description:
This demo was made for LiUGC in Linköping. It was made in 2 months by me. 

In this game you play as Fhindili who is trying to find and rescue her friend who was taken by a shadow people. 

The graphical style is inspired by Nintendo 64 and especially The legend of Zelda - Ocarina of time.
